reviews.author: Jason Gell
reviews.text: Best service ever from Dennis and his team. Sorted all our cabling issues out for us. Would definitely recommend them

reviews.author: Barry Engelbrecht
reviews.text: When starting up, many questions and costs will discourage a entrepreneur. Enter "Logia Genesis " Mr D. Webster solved them, created more than expected and offers virtually all startups requirements. I've not felt as confident as I do now thanks to this powerful establishment. Thank you Mr. D. Webster, you're a company saver

reviews.author: Rory Renaud
reviews.text: Great turnkey service. Very informed & current advice. Seamless & efficient. Would recommend their service's.

reviews.author: Etienne Odendaal
reviews.text: Always willing to assist, quick turnaround time and great workmanship.

reviews.author: Pierre Meyer
reviews.text: Highly recommended and up to date on the latest tech.
